alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 12:36PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Owyhee and east central Malheur Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1235 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Castro Ridge, or 22 miles east of Rome, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Castro Ridge around 1240 PM MDT. South Mountain, Parsnip Peak and Cliffs around 1250 PM MDT. Indian Meadows around 100 PM MDT. Black Warrior Mountain and Triangle around 110 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
